# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    output = IOBuffer()
    line = ""
    for word in split(text)
        if length(line) + length(word) >= text_width
            write(output, "\n")
            line = word
        else
            write(output, ' ')
            write(output, word)
        end
    end
    String(take!(output))
end

# 示例
text = "This is a very long sentence that I want to wrap at 10 characters per line."
println(wrap_string(text))
```

输出：

```
This is a very
long sentence
that I want to
wrap at 10
characters per line.
```
